summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3885 for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Thompson's University Addition, being the alley in block bounded on the north by East 56th Street and by Ravenna Boulevard; on the south by East 55th Street; on the east by 20th Avenue Northeast; and on the west by 17th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47428, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
